transcript_parts.text: i feel like i'm seeing ghosts
shadows lurking behind light posts
follow me and look at me through my
window they're getting close
symptoms that i can't diagnose i pretend
like i know everything but really i
don't
because i don't really understand why i
won't run when it's time to go i get so
close and quit why i don't know
i fight for what i most desire then i
get tired and i lose
the fire in my soul i feel cold alone
trapped inside a zone
where fear is so clear yet i can't let
it go i got my hold on this throne made
of bronze and silver stones
i've made my home the only place i'll
ever know haunted by the thought that
any minute now everything around could
just come
crashing down if there's something is
holding this universe together
that's the only hope that i could ever
measure because i can hear the call to
go back to where i lost it all take a
pen write down all my faults then cross
them off
act like tragedy never occurred they
tell me i can move on but i wonder are
they sure
just live life like you never lived on
the streets like you always had a family
and you never smoked weed
act like you never did drugs just to
feel alive and what it didn't work you
tried attempting suicide
it's like a reflex to wonder where i'll
eat next a grown-ass man but inside i'm
still a street kid i act real solid but
inside i got a secret my heart is broken
and bashed
and bleeding and somehow after this i
kept on walking when my leg got taken
out
i just started hopping when i dressed
real nice but inside i was starving it's
because of warriors inside
that keeps on marching so somehow i've
got to find that inner child
that's buried under lies and buried
under pride and allow love to melt the
ice so that i can arise to the surface
the purpose for which i am alive
